data.message: My friend is having a problem accessing her Facebook account, she's locked out and can't even change her password to get back on. She somehow put in her name a bit differently, without her maiden name, when she got a new phone and computer. Now she has 2 accounts, doesn't want to use the 2nd one, but can't access her original one, can you help?

replies.message: We're sorry to hear that, Linda. Here are a few things your friend can try first: on.fb.me/1ysufS2. -Abby
Facebook , how does she do this if she can't even log in?
I log in but at one point of this stuff I did not understand the point of logging out you will get it together because if tou don't log out people will use your time to comment on and not their own.
You feel me Just a new thing to help you communicate with no loss of gas etc.
